title: BFFs Best Food Friends
description: Chef Jeff and Dev Shah are best food friends. They travel together, eat together, and learn about culture together.
altHero: Dev and Jeff laughing while eating at a restaurant counter
alt1: a hand delicately dresses a bowl of ramen
alt2: Japanese chef hands two bowls across the counter
alt3: Dev and Jeff receive the bowls
alt4: Dev wide-eyed with noodles hanging from his mouth
